QuestData.Title: Gobnapped
QuestData.Description: We never even saw the ambush coming...$b$bThe saberon hit us so hard and fast we barely had time to think.$b$bThose overgrown mongrels dragged the others away and left me here for dead...they probably thought I was too close to dying.$b$bI hear they like their meat fresh...$b<cough>....well I ain't going down that easy!$b$bDon't worry about me...<cough>...I've been through worse! You're gonna have to go to Sabermaw and get the other merchants out though.$b$bThey've probably got 'em all caged up in there...
QuestData.RewardText: You got all of the captured traders out of Sabermaw? Fantastic!$b$bNow they owe me and I ain't one to let a debt go uncollected! As for you, take this reward for your trouble!
